name: Mizuwari: Simple Dialogue System
description:
Mizuwari: Simple Dialogue System - A First-Person Short Story

WASD - Move

E or Left Mouse Button - Talk

Move Mouse - Look (Double click the game view first)

Thanks for being here and for your time. Your support helps me continue creating content.
_
A project initially intended to build a small dialogue tool for R/E Game Dev Discord group, but it turned into a short game.

Talk to the girls and listen to what they have to say. Get to learn more about each girl and discover the mystery behind the barren island.

-Credits-

Music:
Cole Harmon - www.coleharmon.xyz
